Eco Carbon Tracker

- Single-file HTML app with inline CSS and JS (no external libraries/dependencies).
- **Core purpose**: Track personal daily carbon footprint from transport, energy, food, waste; visualize weekly trends; suggest reductions for sustainability.
- **Theme**: Environment & sustainability (fits 2026 eco-awareness push).
- **Offline-first**: Use localStorage to persist all data (entries, goals, history); auto-save every change; load from storage on init.
- **Main UI**:
  - Header: App title, current weekly total CO2 (kg), goal progress bar (default 20kg/week, editable).
  - Input form: 4 drag-and-drop categories (Transport, Energy, Food, Waste) with preset icons/buttons.
  - Drag-and-drop: Drag category tiles to "Add Entry" zone; drop opens modal for quantity/date (e.g., "Car: 10km", "Electricity: 5kWh").
  - Daily/weekly toggle buttons to filter view.
  - List view: Expandable daily entries with editable/delete buttons; **total CO2 calc** using fixed factors (car=0.2kg/km, meat=5kg/meal, etc.).
- **Key features**:
  - **Real-time calc**: JS formulas for CO2 (transport: distance * factor; energy: kWh * 0.5kg; food: servings * factor; waste: items * 0.1kg).
  - **Charts**: Canvas-based bar chart for weekly breakdown (days on X, CO2 on Y, color-coded categories); pie for category split.
  - **Suggestions**: Auto-show 3 tips on high categories (e.g., "Bike instead: saves 2kg"); dismissible.
  - **Undo/Redo**: Ctrl+Z/Y or buttons; stack-based history (max 50 actions) for all add/edit/delete.
  - **Export/Import**: JSON download button; file drag-drop to import (parse/validate).
- **Interactions**:
  - Keyboard: Tab navigation, Enter to submit forms, Arrow keys for list nav, Esc to close modals.
  - Mobile: Touch/drag support; responsive grid (CSS media queries for <768px).
  - ARIA labels on all inputs/buttons for accessibility.
- **Data model** (localStorage 'ecoData'):
  - Array of entries: {id, date (ISO), category, value, co2}.
  - Settings: {weeklyGoal, factors (editable)}.
  - Init with 7-day sample data if empty.
- **Visuals**: Green/earth tones CSS (dark mode toggle via prefers-color-scheme); smooth animations (CSS transitions).
- **Edge cases**: Handle storage quota errors (alert + fallback to sessionStorage); validate inputs (no negatives); auto-prune data >90 days.
- **Testable milestones**:
  1. Load/save 5 entries, see totals update.
  2. Drag-drop new entry, verify calc/persist.
  3. Undo add/delete, check chart refresh.
  4. Toggle views, export JSON, offline reload.
- Max ~800 LOC: Efficient JS (no frameworks), modular functions (render(), calc(), storageOps(), historyStack(), chartDraw()).
